headline: Is Emerson Electric's (EMR) New AI Advisor Transforming Its Role in Industrial Automation Services?
summary: In September 2025, Emerson Electric introduced Guardian Virtual Advisor, an AI-powered software solution designed to streamline end-to-end lifecycle management for industrial automation customers by integrating artificial intelligence with extensive domain expertise. This launch targets the growing demand for intuitive support in industrial operations where operational inefficiencies and global losses are estimated to exceed $1 trillion, spotlighting the need for advanced lifecycle...
